card.name: A Friend of Yore
card.text: Unique. Prisoner. Playable during the site phase at Barad-dûr on an Elf or Dúnadan with a mind of five or more. Tap the character. The company faces 2 attacks: Orcs — 3 strikes with 9 prowess; Trolls — 2 strikes with 10 prowess. This card comes into play inverted; it may be stored at an Elf-hold. Target character may not untap while this card is inverted. Re-invert this card if he is at an Elf-hold or plays or uses (for no effect) a card with a healing effect. This card is worth full mp to a Lord-player. If stored, you may discard this card during the organization phase and bring Prisoner from Ost-in-Edhil into play as a hero character at an Elf-hold; he may be taken from your hand, sideboard, or discard pile.

card.name: A Long Good Talk
card.text: Playable on Gandalf, Radagast, or an Elf-lord. If in the company, Treebeard and Tom Bombadil are not discarded as per their card text when moving to Tom’s House and/or Wellinghall. If both these allies are in the same company you may place them “off to the side” with this card. You may then tap both (at any time) to either:* Make Awakened Plant creatures playable at your avatar’s current site against minion companies this turn;* Give +2 to a ring test, or cancel Rolled Down to the Sea played earlier in the same chain of effects;* Store Fate of the Ithil Stone or Into the Smoking Cone at Mount Doom or Barad-dûr (as if at a Haven [H]);* take one Cracks of Doom or The Old Thrush from your discard pile to your hand;

card.name: Ancient Knowledge
card.text: Playable on an Elf with a mind of 6 or more (5 or more if a Noldo or Sinda) at a Haven [H]. When a Lost Knowledge card is required to be discarded from his company, you may discard this card instead. If target Elf is a scout or ranger, this card may also be discarded instead of a Stolen Knowledge card.

card.name: Ancient Skill and Wisdom
card.text: Playable on an Elf with mind 8 or more(7 or more if a Noldo) at a Haven [H]. Target Elf may use spells as if a Wizard (except Sacrifice of Form; if on Glorfindel he may play Sacrifice of Form against a Nazgûl or Spawn attack: keep this card with Sacrifice of Form and place both on Glorfindel when he re-enters play).

card.name: Aranrûth
card.text: Unique. Weapon. If bearer is a Dúnadan or Sinda Elf this item gives 3 corruption points. Each Dúnadan in the company is considered an Elf for the purpose of interpreting The Evenstar. Warrior only: +3 prowess (to a maximum of 12) and -2 to target’s body. +2 EI against Dúnedain and Sinda Elves. tap: and play The Evenstar to untap a Dúnadan or Sinda in the company facing a strike. Bearer makes a CP modified by +2.

card.name: Attuning the Blade
card.text: Ritual. Sage only. Playable during the site phase at a site where Information is playable. taTap a sage, place this card on a non-unique weapon item in the company, and choose a type: Drake, Giant, Orc, Spider, Troll, Undead or Wolf. The weapon gives +2 prowess or -1 to target’s body (decide during the strike sequence) against strikes of the chosen type. Sage makes a CP modified by -2. Cannot be duplicated on a given item.

card.name: Blood of Huan
card.text: Playable on a Noble Hound controlled by anElf or a non-overt ranger. +1 to body. The Noble Hound is considered an Elf character for the purpose of cards that modify prowess. Cannot be duplicated on a given Noble Hound. tap: allow target Noble Hound to face any number of strikes from an attack (if you assign a strike of the attack). Each strike sequence must be faced separately.

card.name: Bow of Yew
card.text: Bow. A given character may bear only oneBow of Yew. Cannot be used by a Hobbit. Warrior only: tap: modify one strike from a hazard creature attack (or any attack if bearer is Bard Bowman or a Nando or Silvan Elf) another character in the company faces by -2 to prowess and body (only to prowess if another Bow of Yew has been tapped against the same strike).

card.name: Choose a Mortal Life
card.text: Playable on Arwen, Elladan, or Elrohir. Tap target character if untapped. +1 mind and +1 EI against Dúnedain. Target character is also considered a Dúnadan; if controlled by a Dúnadan, he costs only 3 points of influence to be controlled. The Burden of Time cannot be played on him. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Clean the Greenwood
card.text: Trophy. Playable during the site phase on a company at a non-Haven site in Mirkwood (not in Woodland Realm), if Towers Destroyed is rotated at least once. The company faces two of the following attacks (opponent’s choice; cannot be cancelled): Spiders — 5 strikes with 7 prowess; Orcs — 3 strikes with 8 prowess; Trolls 2 — strikes with 9 prowess. Demon — 1 strike with 11 prowess. After the attacks, tap a character in the company or discard this card. Store this card (at any time) when the company is at a Haven [H], or at a Free-hold [F] in Mirkwood or its adjacent regions. If stored it is worth 2 mp and the prowess and strikes of attacks of the above named types against hero companies at or moving to a site in Mirkwood are modified by -1 (to a minimum of 2). Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

card.name: Cloak of Many Colours
card.text: Discard if not borne by a Wizard or an Elf sage with mind 7 or more. tap: gain one of the following abilities (for the bearer) this turn. * bearer may tap to test a gold ring;* if at a Haven [H], bearer may join any of your companies facing a creature attack: he must face a strike of the attack;* increase your hand size by 1;* draw 1 additional card for each Wilderness [w] region in his company’s site path;* tbearer may tap during the end-of-turn phase to take one spell or ritual from your discard pile to your hand;Bearer makes a CP when this item becomes tapped. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Crisfuin
card.text: Unique. Staff. This item can only be used by a Wizardor Elf-lord. +1 EI. +1 prowess (+3 against magic- users). You may place a spell from hand with this item; bearer makes a CP modified by -2. Only one spell may be with Crisfuin at any given time. Any spell placed with this item may be played as if from hand; ignore the spell’s CPC. tap: at any time to prevent a non-avatar character at the same site with a mind lower than bearer’s (10 for a Wizard) from using spells or magic resources this turn.

card.name: Elenya
card.text: Unique. Lesser Ring. Only playable at Osteledanor Telpëmar if the company discards (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls. +1 to bearer’s mind and EI. -1 body. All of bearer’s CPC are modified by +1 for each hero environment resource in play. tap: take one Echo of All Joy or The Evenstar from your discard pile to your hand. Bearer makes a CP.

card.name: Elf-friend
card.text: Playable on a character at an Elf-hold (not an Elf, Wizard, Ringwraith or overt character). Target character receives +2 EI against Elves. He suffers no negative modification according to his race when attempting to influence Elf factions. Additionally, target character is also considered an Elf for the purpose of non-environment, non-item cards and effects. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Elven Blade
card.text: Playable on Aeglin, Aiglos, Anglachel, Angrist, Anguirel, Glamdring, Kirrauko, Orcrist, Ringil, Sting, Sulhelka, Sword of Gondolin, or Ungolcrist. Any Biter and Beater! played on the company also affects this item. tap: give -1 strike to an Orc, Troll or Undead attack (to a minimum of 1). Bearer makes a CPC. Cannot be duplicated on a given item.

card.name: Elven Bridge
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase ona moving company containing an Elf bearing Elven Rope. Name a region (not a Coastal Sea [c], Dark-domain [d] or region with 2 or more symbols) ; this region (both type and name) is not considered in the company’s site path for the purpose of playing hazards and interpreting hazard effects.

card.name: Elves of Lothlórien
card.text: Unique. Playable at Lórien if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Elves (+2), Dwarves (-2), characters with Lórien as a home site (+2). This faction gives 2 mp if Balrog of Moria is not in active play.

card.name: Elves of Taur Rómen
card.text: Unique. Playable at Rhûbar or at any Refuge site in Taur Rómen if the influence check is greater than 11. Standard Modifications: Elves (+2), Dúnedain (+1), Dwarves (-3), Men (-2), (apply once for each given race in the company). tap: at any time to make Galadhrim playable keyed to any Refuge site in play, or to the Wilderness [w] region containing it, this turn.

card.name: Elves of the House
card.text: Unique. Playable at Rivendell if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Dúnedain/ Elves (+2), characters with Rivendell as a home site (+2). This faction gives 2 mp if Rogrog or The Witch-king of Angmar is in play.

card.name: Eryn Lasgalen
card.text: Unique. Playable if Clean the Greenwood or Pass the Doors of Dol Guldur is in play. Each of your unique factions played at sitesin Mirkwood or its adjacent regions may tap to give -1 to the prowess and strikes (to a minimum of 1) of a rescue-attack or attack from Rescue Prisoners one of your companies faces at a site in Mirkwood. Additionally, if you receive mp for Profitable Trade with factions played in Wilderland, Southern Mirkwood becomes a Shadow-land [s] and CvCC is no longer cancelled by Dol Guldur’ssite card effect. Automatic-attacks at minion Free-holds [F] and Border-holds [B] in Mirkwood receive +2 prowess and cannot be cancelled.

card.name: Essay on Ringcraft
card.text: Lost Knowledge. Playable at Amon Lind, Osteledan,or Ost-in-Edhil. If bearer is a sage or an Elf with a mind of 5 or more and is at a Haven [H], he may tap and replace this item with a Lesser Ring or Magic Ring item, which may be taken from hand, sideboard, or discard pile; place this card in your sideboard.

card.name: Great Bow of Lórien
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Playable on Bow of the Galadhrim if borne by Legolas or Fanar.+2 to prowess (to a maximum of 9). You may tap Bow of the Galadhrim to modify a strike another character in the company is facing by a combined value of -3 to prowess and/or body (also during CvCC). Discard this card if Bow of the Galadhrim is not borne by Legolas or Fanar.

card.name: Great Bow of Yew
card.text: Weapon. Bow. Warrior only: +2 prowess to a maximum of 8 (maximum of 9 if borne by a Nando or Silvan Elf). Cannot be used by a Hobbit. tap: allow bearer to remain untapped against a strike from an attack keyed to a region, which does not choose defending characters.

card.name: Great Friendship
card.text: Playable on Gimli or Legolas, if both are in the same company and after defeating an attack. Tap Gimli and Legolas if untapped. If both are in the same company: +1 to their body, and both may tap to give +3 to any one roll made by/for the other. If either is controlled by the other, he costs only 3 points of influence to control. You may discard this card to let either character take a strike assigned to the other, to cancel an influence attempt against either character, or to cancel a hazard that would remove either character from the company. Discard this card if either character leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Greenwood the Great
card.text: Information. Playable on a character after the successful play of a faction at a site in Mirkwood. Tap the character. Discard this card to take a character or resource only playable at a site in Mirkwood from your discard pile to your hand. Alternatively, discard this card when CvCC is declared (during any turn) at a site in Mirkwood to untap all unwounded characters in the company and to give all characters in the company +1 prowess this turn. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Gwaith-i-Mírdain
card.text: Unique. Playable if you tap an Elf sage or discard a Lost Knowledge resource from play. Any roll for testing a gold ring at a site in Hollin is modified by +1. Additionally, any Elf or Dwarf sage may tap to make non-unique ore resources that are playable at any Under-deeps site playable at his current site in Hollin this turn. When this card is discarded from play, you may take one Ringlore, Secrets of Their Forging or Knowledge of Their Making from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Hair of Uinen
card.text: Unique. Environment. Cancels the effects of Drowning Seas, Storms of Ossë and Winds of Wrath. Additionally, if Gatesof Morning is in play, any hero Elf or Dúnadan may tap to give -2 prowess or -1 body to a hazard creature attack against his company keyed to a Coastal Sea [c] region or at a site therein (by type or name).

card.name: Healing Song
card.text: Song. Playable on an Elf, if a character or ally in the company is wounded. Target Elf makes a CP modified by -1 for every environment hazard in play and by +1 for every environment hero resource in play. Your next turn, at the beginning of the same phase in which this card was played, discard this card and you may heal one Elf in the company (or any one character or ally if target Elf is Nando or Silvan) from wounded to tapped.

card.name: Knowledge of Narya
card.text: Minion only. Stolen Knowledge. Playable during the site phase on a lone scout, if his company has faced an attack by Gandalf the White Rider the same turn, or if an opponent’s company containing Gandalf or Mithrandir is at the same site (or containing Círdan if Realm of Narya is in play). Tap the scout. This card may be stored at Barad-dûr or a Darkhaven [K]. Only the first Knowledge of Narya stored is worth 4 mp: Gandalf (respectively Círdan) receives -1 to all his CP.

card.name: Knowledge of Nenya
card.text: Minion only. Stolen Knowledge. Playable during the site phase on an Elf in a covert company that has faced an attack from Lady of the Golden Wood this turn. May also be played without having faced this attack, at the same site as an opponent’s Galadriel (or at Lórien if she is not in play). Target Elf faces an attack alone: Elf — 1 strike with 12 prowess (detainment; neither attack nor strike can be cancelled). If the strike is successful, the character is taken prisoner at Lórien (Rescue-attacks: exact duplicate of all automatic-attacks of the site at the time of rescue). Otherwise tap the character or discard this card. This card may be stored at Barad-dûr or a Darkhaven [K]. Only the first Knowledge of Nenya stored is worth 4 mp: all characters with Lórien as a home site receive +1 mind.

card.name: Knowledge of Vilya
card.text: Minion only. Stolen Knowledge. Playable during the site phase on an Elf in a covert company that has faced an attack from Master of the House this turn. May also be played without having faced this attack, at any site where an opponent’s Elrond is present site (or at Rivendell if he is not in play). Target Elf faces an attack alone: Elf — 1 strike with 13 prowess (detainment; neither attack nor strike can be cancelled). If the strike is successful, the character is taken prisoner at Rivendell (Rescue-attacks: exact duplicate of all automatic- attacks of the site at the time of rescue). Otherwise tap the character or discard this card. This card may be stored at Barad-dûr or a Darkhaven [h] K]. Only the first Knowledge of Vilya stored is worth 4 mp: all characters with home site Rivendell receive +1 mind.

card.name: Light of Lothlórien
card.text: Unique. Playable on Galadriel. When you play this card, you may bring Lady of the Golden Wood into play from your hand, discard pile or sideboard (overriding any conflicting rules). Discard Lady of the Golden Wood if Galadriel is not at Lórien. Additionally, if you are Galadriel, this card gives 1 P and Galadriel may use True Fána as if she were a Wizard; for the purpose of True Fána, Galadriel’s prowess is modified by +2 (+4 if Nenya has been played that turn).

card.name: Looking from Mind to Mind
card.text: Playable on a company containing three or morecharacters of which the majority is Elf. Except when strikes are being resolved, an Elf or Wizard in the company may tap to untap another Elf or Wizard in the company with an equal or lower mind (10 for a Wizard). Discard this card if at any time the conditions to play it are no longer met, or when any play deck is exhausted.

card.name: New Closeness to His Kin
card.text: Playable on a company. One Elf (even an agent or minion) character may be played as a hero character with target company at a Haven [H]. Place this card with the Elf: +1 to his mind. Discard target character if he is the only Elf in the company. This card may be played with a starting company in lieu of a minor item. When played as such, reveal it as if it were a character.

card.name: Of the Green-elves
card.text: Playable on a moving company containing only Elves, Wizards and/or Hobbits. For each Wilderness [w] in the company’s site path you may tap a Nando or Silvan Elf to lower the hazard limit by one. You may not tap more Elves in this fashion than there are hazards played on the company this turn. Environment hazards and creatures that require two or more Wilderness in the site path do not count against the hazard limit for the rest of the movement/hazard phase.

card.name: Raft-elves
card.text: Unique. Playable at Celebannon if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Elves (+2), Dwarves (-2) — apply once for each race in the company, Wood-elves (+2), Men of Lake- town (+2) tap: bring one Down the Hurrying Waters from your discard pile to your play deck and shuffle.

card.name: Reconstructed Towers
card.text: Unique. Playable during the site phase on The White Towers, if your company there contains at least 3 Elves and/or Dúnedain, and theWizardhaven version of The White Towers is not in play. The company faces an attack: Wolves — 4 strikes with 9 prowess (cannot be cancelled). Following the attack, tatap an Elf or Dúnadan at the site or discard this card. The site never leaves active play. All versions of The White Towers become a Free-hold [F]. Fallen-wizards may not use the stage version. Replace all automatic-attacks with: Elves — 3 strikes with 9 prowess (detainment against hero and covert companies). Palantír of Elostirion affects Dúnedain as if Elves. This card is worth full mp to a Lord-player.

card.name: Reconstructed Towers
card.text: Unique. Playable during the site phase on The White Towers, if your company there contains at least 3 Elves and/or Dúnedain, and theWizardhaven version of The White Towers is not in play. The company faces an attack: Wolves — 4 strikes with 9 prowess (cannot be cancelled). Following the attack, tap an Elf or Dúnadan at the site or discard this card. The site is never discarded or returned to the location deck. All versions of The White Towers become a Free-hold [F]. Fallen- wizards may not use the stage version and may not play any stage card on The White Towers. Replace all automatic-attacks with: Elves — 3 strikes with 9 prowess (detainment against hero and covert companies). Palantír of Elostirion affects Dúnedain as if Elves. This card is worth full mp to a Lord-player.

card.name: Ring of Adamant
card.text: Unique. Elven Ring. Playable at Lórien, if Galadriel is not in play and you have stored Knowledge of Nenya. May also be played at any site after CvCC by the character whose strike against Galadriel has been successful (tap character and site). Values in parentheses and brackets apply to an Elf bearer. Nenya may not be played. tap: at the end of the organization phase, if borne by a character with mind 5 or more, to ignore one region of your choice in the company’s site path (both name and type) for the purpose of all hazards; bearer makes a CP modified by -2.

card.name: Ring of Ruby
card.text: Unique. Elven Ring. Playable at any Elf-hold or Dwarf-hold, if Gandalf and Realm of Narya are not in play and you have stored Knowledge of Narya. May also be played at any site after CvCC by the character whose strike against Gandalf (or Círdan if Realm of Narya is in play) has been successful (tap character and site). Values in brackets and parentheses apply to an Elf bearer. Narya may not be played. tap: at any time, if borne by a character with mind 5 or more, to untap one or two characters in the company; bearer makes a CP modified by -2.

card.name: Ring of Sapphire
card.text: Unique. Elven Ring. Playable at Rivendell, if Elrond is not in play and you have stored Knowledge of Vilya. May also be played at any site after CvCC by the character whose strike against Elrond has been successful (tap character and site). Values in brackets and parentheses apply to an Elf bearer. Vilya may not be played. tatap: and tap bearer during the organization phase to take any one minion resource event from your discard pile to your hand. Bearer makes a CP modified by -2.

card.name: Royal Duo
card.text: Unique. Playable on Galadriel if Celeborn is in the company. Tap Galadriel and Celeborn if untapped. If both are in the same company, any influence, flattery or offering attempt either of them makes is modified by adding the unused EI of the other. Discard this card if either character leaves active play.

card.name: Sail to the West
card.text: Playable during the site phase on a non-avatar Elf at Grey Havens if Círdan or Círdor is there. Tap the site. Target Elf must make a CP. If still in play afterwards, place him “off to the side” with this card; store any items he controls and discard any allies. Target character is not worth any mp. This card may also be played on an opponent’s character or revealed agent (under the same playability conditions): it is then worth 1 mp to opponent instead.

card.name: Seekers of Knowledge
card.text: Place this card in your mp. You may place any of your stored Book of Mazarbul, Scroll of Isildur, Lost Knowledge or Stolen Knowledge resource with this card. If there are at least three different of such resources with this card it is worth 2 mp (even to a Fallen-Pallando or Fallen-Saruman player).

card.name: Soul-piercing
card.text: Playable on Galadriel. An opponent’s character of yourchoice at Galadriel’s current site must make a CP modified by -2. If still in play afterwards, opponent may remove a corruption card from the character. Otherwise you may look at opponent’s hand. Galadriel makes a CP. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn for a given character.

card.name: Spirit of Celebrían
card.text: Unique. Playable if a hero Elf with a mind of five or more is in play. Whenever a character with Lórien or Rivendell as a home site is assigned a strike from an Orc attack (or from an Orc character in CvCC), its controlling player may choose to assign to the character another strike from that attack (or from another Orc character in CvCC), regardless of the attack’s abilities or other resources played. When this card would be discarded from play, you may remove it from the game instead, along with one Orc hazard creature of your choice which opponent has revealed to you through a mechanism of the game.

card.name: Sulhelka
card.text: Unique. Playable at any Dark-hold [D], if the company has faced a Nazgûl attack the same turn. May also be played atany site after CvCC by the character whose strike against a Ringwraith has been successful (tap character and site). Weapon. +2 EI against Elves and Dwarves. Warrior only: +3 prowess (+4 against Drakes and Undead) to a maximum of 10, and -1 to target’s body. Sage only: tap: bring one Bitter Cold into play from your discard pile or sideboard (ignore any CP). Bearer is not affected and/or cannot be the target of Lava Flows, Dragon’s Breath and Scourge of Fire.

card.name: Swanships of Lindon
card.text: Playable on a character with Grey Havens or Edhellond as a home site. When moving to a port or site in a Coastal Sea [c] region, you may tap target character and discard (for no effect) one Fair Sailing, Great Ship, Stars, or The Evenstar to replace the company’s new site with another port or site in a Coastal Sea region in the same or an adjacent region. You may discard this card from play to bring one Fair Sailing, Favor of the Valar, Hair of Uinen, Stars, The Evenstar, or Ulmo’s Watch from your discard pile to your hand. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: The High Sea
card.text: Unique. As a short event, playable if you discard (for no effect) a Favor of the Valar or Returned Beyond All Hope. Name a non-avatar Elf placed “off to the side” with Sail to the West or in any out of play pile. Make a roll, adding the character’s mind; if the result is greater than 10, the character may be brought into active play at Grey Havens (discard any Sail to the West played on him). If the character was in play by your opponent, you must play a copy of the character from your hand instead; discard opponent’s copy. As a permanent-event, playable on an Elf with mind 6 or more placed “off to the side” with Sail to the West.

card.name: The Three Are Together
card.text: Unique. Playable during the organization phase on a company at a Haven [H] containing Elrond, Galadriel, and Gandalf (or Círdan if Realm of Narya is in play). These characters in the company receive +2 to their prowess and EI, and +2 to any CP they make for playing a resource short-event. Discard this card if the company does not contain three of the above named characters (or manifestations thereof).

card.name: They Are Accounted For
card.text: Any test for a gold ring is modified by: +1 for every Elven Ring in play; +1 for every two Dwarven Rings in play; +1 for every three Man and/or Spirit Rings in play; and +1 for every five other rings in play. Discard this card if The One Ring comes into play. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Towers Destroyed
card.text: Playable on a company at Lórien or Thranduil’s Halls. May also be played on your starting company in lieu of a minor item, if you start thegame at one of these sites. During the site phase at Dol Guldur, the company may face attacks based on the number of times this card is rotated: none: Orcs — 3 strikes with 8 prowess; Once: Trolls — 2 strikes with 9 prowess; Twice: Nazgûl — 1 strike with 15 prowess; Thrice: Fallen-Maia — 1 strike with 20 prowess. If such an attack is defeated, tap an avatar or warrior in the company to rotate this card 90° (or place a token). If rotated 360°, place this card with Dol Guldur for 5 mp: the site does not leave active play, and all versions of Dol Guldur become a Ruins & Lairs [R]. Southern Mirkwood becomes a Shadow-land [s]. Cannot be duplicated on Dol Guldur or by a given player.

card.name: Ulmo's Watch
card.text: Unique. Playable if you tap a Dúnadan or Elf with a mind of 7 or more (5 or more if a Sinda). If a hero company moves with at least three Wildernesses [w] or one Coastal Sea [c] in their site path, their company’s size is considered 2 less than normal for the company (to a minimum of 2) until the end of the turn. Additionally, if Gates of Morning is in play, each Elf, Dúnadan, Maia, and Wizard in such a company gains the sage skill and may tap to discard a card placed on-guard at his company’s new site.

card.name: Ungolcrist
card.text: Unique. Playable at Shelob’s Lair. Weapon. +2 prowess to a maximum of 8 (+4 prowess and -3 to target’s body against Spiders, if bearer is a warrior). Bearer must make a CP modified by +1 when his company faces a Spider attack; he must be assigned the first strike from such an attack and must make an additional CP modified by -1 if the attack is cancelled.

card.name: Very Active Governess
card.text: Unique. Playable on Galadriel if Royal Duo isin play. Once per phase Galadriel may make a CP: if still in play afterwards she may untap.

card.name: Welcomed by the Lord and Lady
card.graphics: Welcomed by the Lord and Lady.jpg
card.text: Unique. Playable only with your starting company in lieu of a minor item, if you have two or more Elves with home site Lórien in play (or one such Elf and an avatar). Reveal this card as if it were a character. You may start the game at Lórien. Your Wizard or Lord may come into play there. Discard this card if you do not have a character with home site Lórien in active play, or if you have 6 P or more.

card.name: Well Aimed
card.text: Playable on a character bearing and able to use a bow, when another character in his company is facing a strike (not from a detainment or non-combat attack, or in CvCC). Make a roll, adding the character’s prowess (+3 if he is Nando or Silvan) and the normal mp of the bow he bears. If the result is higher than the strike’s prowess, modify the strike by a combined value of -3 to prowess and/or body. If target character is Nando or Silvan, you may shuffle this card into your play deck instead of discarding it from play. Cannot be duplicated for a given strike.
